Please_deposit_more: Please deposit more money or lower your bet
helpPage1Text0:
All pays except scatter pays are paid when like symbols appear on adjacent reels

from left to right starting with the leftmost reel. Scatters pays are paid for

symbols appearing in any position on the reels. Only highest like symbol win paid

Scatter pays are paid in addition to base game pays.
helpPage1Text1:
One or more              in a winning combination is wild and substitutes for all symbols

except             and
helpPage1Text2: except               appears on reels 2 and 4 only.
helpPage2Text0:
3           scattered  on reels 1, 3 and 5 starts the U-SPIN Wheel Bonus Feature.

One spin of the wheel is awarded.
helpPage2Text1:
Touching anywhere on the screen spins the Wheel.

The           Wheel bonus awards are Jackpots, Credits, or Free Games.
helpPage3Text0:
The Free Games Bonus Feature is only started by the U-Spin Wheel Feature.
12 free games are awarded. All free games are played with the same bet
levels that were in play when the free games were started. During the
Free Games Bonus Feature, all pays except Jackpot Awards are doubled.
Additional free games may be awarded during the Free Games Bonus Feature
and are added to the remaining free games. Money Bag Bonus Feature is
available during free games. U-Spin Wheel Bonus Feature is available
during free games. The Free Games Bonus Feature ends when no free games
remain or when 60 free games have been played. The Major Jackpot
Prize on the wheel during free games is always 2500x total bet.
Minor Jackpot Prize during free games is always 50x total bet.
helpPage4Text0:
3 scattered            on reels 2, 3 and 4 starts the Money Bag Bonus Feature.

Select 1 of 3            to reveal its credit value. The 2 unpicked  

credit values are then revealed and the Money Bag Bonus Feature ends.
helpPage4Text1:
Money Bag Bonus Feature awards range from 3x to 50x total bet credits.

Bonus awards shown have already been multiplied by the total bet.
helpPage5Text0:
Bet ways win when matching symbols appear on adjacent reels from the
leftmost to the rightmost. Only highest win per way is paid. All symbols pay as
described in the paytable.
Wins on different ways are added together and scatter wins (if available) are
added to way wins.
rtp: The theoretical average return to player (RTP) is %rtpValue%
helpPage5Text20: All lines pay Left to Right. Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
